author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10009568

Heart-pounding action. High-intensity combat. Destruction like you have never seen it before.

Our Hero squad goes head to head with the Pax Armata threat as they storm a war torn New York City on the brink of collapse.

This is all-out warfare. This is Battlefield 6. Deployment begins October 10.

#ps5 #ps5games #battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 - Launch Live Action Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012303

The Hiss threat keeps on growing, and now the Mold is spreading through the Research Sector. The Oldest House is reaching a breakpoint, but Firebreak, ever adaptable, is ready to face this crisis.  

The first free Major Update, Breakpoint, is packed with systemic overhauls, new content, and quality-of-life improvements - all aimed at making FBC: Firebreak more fun, varied, and rewarding to play. 

FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order. 

FBC: Firebreak is out now on PlayStation 5. 

Developed and published by Remedy Entertainment.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: FBC: Firebreak - Breakpoint Update Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Parasite Mutant is a survival horror RPG that uses Active Time Chain system. Players play as Psionic Agent Nova who is on a mission to investigate a mysterious abandoned island city, eventually leading her to uncover a hidden conspiracy and secret, changing her fate completely.

#ps5 #ps5games

title: Parasite Mutant - Announce Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist now:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015561/

Experience an anomaly-hunting horror game inspired by liminal spaces and psychological horror walking simulators.

The Cabin Factory is coming out on 16th October 2025!

Your job at the Cabin Factory is simple - inspect the cabins and decide whether they’re haunted or not. And if you find any anomalies, get out… immediately. 

FEATURES:
- An atmospheric horror experience - explore haunted cabins alone and try not to lose your sanity, 
- A compact story - experience the entire game in a single evening,
- Available in 13 languages - choose your preferred one and fully immerse yourself in the game. 


#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #cabinfactory
title: The Cabin Factory - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Acting alone, without back up or deadly weapons, a forensic analyst searches desperately for evidence to connect a spate of disparate murders to a single Serial Killer, in this highly pressured Survival Horror Game.
